title: The Relationship of Trust, Truth, Agape, Love and Dialogos: the Psychedelic Conversation Part 5
description:
Mark and Karen continue to track and spar with Jordan Peterson and John Vervaeke, concentrating today on their discussion of Agape and Logos. 

The video we're discussing of JBP and JV
The Psychedelic Conversation Creates a Question:  
https://youtu.be/chybRUqE2_A

A play list of all ten episodes analyzing this conversation: https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLoARw9zo4EUYEEhM_KIgzl_eW9ZZTHbzh


Mark's Youtube Channel: 
Navigating Patterns:  https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCgIbaWd7raqeIGUS1cHNgPg

A note from Mark Lefebvre:
John Vervaeke makes all of these conversations possible for me and others. Thank you so much John!
Join us on the Awakening From the Meaning Crisis discord, where we have great conversations every day and a number of practices you can participate in!
https://discord.gg/3TmZCGyQz7

The Meaning Community is our website project to showcase the work of John Vervaeke and hub for all the sites related to addressing the meaning crisis!
Copies of the slide are here as well! Come and participate with us as we build a community of like minded individuals working on the issues around meaning.
https://meaningcommunity.com/
